subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: {{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} minimally reconstructs the {{cog|och|-}} as ''*wînʔ'' and suggests a derivation from {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*lwi(j)||flow; stream}}, just like {{och-l|水|tr=lhuiʔ}} (minimally reconstructed); early liquids ''*l-'' or ''*r-'' often disappeared before glides ''*j-'' or ''*w-'' in {{cog|ltc|-}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{†}} {{lb|zh|of droplets of water}} to [[flow]]; to [[trickle]]
# {{†}} to [[cry]]; to [[shed]] [[tear]]s
# {{†}} {{lb|zh|of dew}} [[glimmer]]ing; [[glisten]]ing
# {{†}} [[dew]]
